title: For more information and advice, you can contact us
subtitle: Ponte en contacto con nosotros
p: Write to our emails, according to the information you need:

emails.content: If you have any questions related to our programs and services, you can contact us through this E-mail
If you are already a client and have any direct queries to our organization, you can do so through the following channel:

emails.type: Query about degree or postgraduate programs
emails.content: If you wish to make a direct inquiry about our degree or postgraduate programs you can do so at:
If you want to share information on topics related to workplace safety and be part of our quarterly SAFETYCARD magazine, you can write to us at:
If you have any complaint about the service received by our organization or an Authorized Osha-Institute center you can write to us at:
If you wish to confirm an agreement or be a provider of Osha-Institute courses and certifications, you can contact us at:
If you wish to be an Authorized Osha-Institute Center and represent our brand in your country, you can write to us at:
If you want to know about our Corporate programs and services valid worldwide, you can write to us at:
If you wish to be accredited and have a professional degree proposed and certified by Osha-Institute you can write to us at:
If you want to access a professional membership and belong to our community that participates in 170 countries worldwide, you can write to us at:
emails.conten2: If you wish to contract one of our professional memberships and be able to access our courses, accreditation degrees, seminars, symposiums and certifications, you can write to us directly at:

emails.content: If you have work experience in the areas of Occupational Safety and Occupational Risk Prevention and do not have a professional certificate that accredits you as such, you can write to us and have an Osha-Institute degree.
If you wish to report any dissatisfaction with our services or the services of authorized centers, you can write to us at:
If you have questions about our online exams you can write to us directly at:

emails.type: Support or problems with online programs
emails.content: If you wish to receive support or have any problems with our online programs, you can contact us via E-mail :
